explains: n. 生态学者；生态保护论者

sentences.en: An ecologist who studies a pond today may well find it relatively unchanged in a year's time.
sentences.cn: 如今研究池塘的生态学者很可能会发现，池塘在一年之内基本没什么变化。

sentences.en: The ecologist is concerned primarily with the quantities of matter and energy that pass through a given ecosystem, and with the rates at which they do so.
sentences.cn: 生态学家主要关注的是流经某一生态系统的物质和能量的量以及它们的速度。

sentences.en: "Many factors contributed to the decline", said Patrick McIntyre, an ecologist who was the lead author of the study.
sentences.cn: 该研究的领头作者、生态学家帕特里克·麦克伦泰尔表示：“许多因素导致了这种下降。”
